definition[0]: to shout loudly in an unpleasant high voice because you are angry, afraid, or excited
example[2]: She screeched at me to take off my muddy shoes.
definition[1]: if a vehicle screeches, its wheels make a high unpleasant noise as it moves along or stops
example[3]: A van screeched onto the road in front of me.
example[4]: The car screeched to a halt.
